content.question: The artist who created the Aka elephant mask continued the Bamileke tradition of incorporating elephant imagery in the work because

choices.label: elephants were associated with the power and authority of kings
the Kuosi Society rewarded artists for the finest elephant transformations
elephants were highly feared, and the masks held the power to thwart off their danger
the maskâ€™s elephant trunk could be lifted to reveal the face of a revered ancestor

content.answer: elephants were associated with the power and authority of kings
